dao.name: QUY_ORDER_APPRAISE_FOR_ORDER_DT
dao.statement: select SUM(DECODE(FEE_TYP, 'R', ITEM_AMT)) rent_amt, SUM(DECODE(FEE_TYP, 'S', ITEM_AMT)) serv_amt, SUM(ITEM_AMT) other_tot from TMP_ORDER_APPRAISE WHERE ikey = :ikey AND key_nos = :key_nos AND ikey_seq_nos = :ikey_seq_nos AND SEQ_NOS = PARENT_SEQ_NOS AND ATHENA_ID = :athena_id AND HOTEL_COD = :hotel_cod
